basics.name: Tracy Mutugi
basics.label: Data Analyst
basics.summary: I am a forward-thinker excited about using data to build smarter cities using data-driven urban transport and housing solutions. I have done work in Latin America, Africa, the Middle East and Asia working with municipal governments and private sector clients including Google Maps and the World Bank

education.area: Data Science and Information Systems Development
Bachelor of Science in Urban Planning

highlights: Reviewed and enriched datasets for global clients such as Google Maps, the World Bank, Bolt SA, Grab Asia and Rumbo
Engineered automated data validations into survey tools to improve data quality and reduce data entry error
Cleaning, processing and geocoding government asset data for City of Joburg municipality
Prepared data and processed export requests in SQL
Designed data visualisations and dashboards to assist managers to view regional and ward specific data

awards.title: Postgraduate Merit Award
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to students in the top 10% of the undergraduate class.
